patthana14.2:1.1_0: Sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.2:1.1_1: Sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.2:1.1_2: Sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko ca naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana14.2:2.1_0: Ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.2:2.1_1: Ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.2:2.1_2: Ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko ca naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana14.2:3.1_0: Sahetukañca ahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.2:3.1_1: Sahetukañca ahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.2:3.1_2: Sahetukañca ahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko ca naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
